sdu.dsa.monitor
Class Monitor

java.lang.Object
  sdu.dsa.monitor.Monitor

public class Monitor
extends java.lang.Object

Monitor that gathers all the data from the sensors in order to send them to the server.

Version:
1.0
Author:
DSA-Project Group [Spring 2012]
